mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customerInusMapping (CUSTOMERID, INSURANCESTARTDATE, INSURANCEENDDATE, INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER) VALUES ( #{customerID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 12 * 20), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{insuranceProductNumber} )

MERGE INTO specialInsuMapping s USING (SELECT #{customerID} AS customerID FROM dual) d ON (s.customerID = d.customerID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET s.insuFee = #{insuFee}, s.selectedInsurances = #{selectedInsurances} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (insuFee, selectedInsurances, customerID) VALUES (#{insuFee}, #{selectedInsurances}, #{customerID})
mapper.select: SELECT a.INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER, a.INSURANCECOMPANYCODE, a.INSURANCEPRODUCTNAME, a.INSURANCEFEE, a.INSURANCECOMPANYNAME, a.INSUCONTENT, a.MINAGEATREGISTRATION, a.MAXAGEATREGISTRATION, b.CUSTOMERID, b.INSURANCESTARTDATE, b.INSURANCEENDDATE FROM GradeInsurance a JOIN customerInusMapping b ON a.INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER = #{insuranceProductNumber} AND b.CUSTOMERID = #{customerId}
